message: Whoa, I almost forgot Dexter was on tonight.
Dexter time!!
yay!
me too I think
BTW the Dexter opening always reminds me of the Ubuntu power-on noise
Just the first few seconds
How awesome is this show? A) Very awesome B) The awesomest C) The most awesome
End of Season 4 was one of the best moments on TV IMO
A
I kind of want to watch some now... but @defunkt is watching a Louis CK thing
yeah, but I think I've heard most of his jokes by now
cool. haven't heard of him but I'll check it out
Louis CK is good too
My favorite comedian right now is Pete Holmes ( http://www.peteholmes.com )
Season finale tonight
deb is now one of my all-time fav characters on tv
she and dexter  broke up in real life :(
@matthuang so you're saying there's a chance
@ericflo well Michael C. Hall is quite gingery
a crush on deb?
She's a great character but her face makes me think she's a man
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KX5jNnDMfxA
I have a massive crush on that actress
I saw every episode in seasons one through four and have avoided season five thus far. When is that bad boy coming to iTunes?
I love  this show, but the acting is creepy. I never thought that was possible, but it is genuinely creeeepy.
michael c. hall is sooo good. creepy but likable? I don't know how he pulls it off
@ericflo I always knew you loved creeps.. and WHAT? that's creepy
@ericflo What does a star mean? Is it similar to a "Like" or does it favorite it? unclear
@ericflo ya, would be cool to express your opinion on someone's comment or star something to a list of comments you want to save for later. loving it. Slightly off topic though. Sorry :)
@Emma It's *supposed* to be creepy, though :)
@Emma No worries
It's OK though, we know things won't stay perfectly on-topic, it's natural for things to drift :)
@ericflo Dexter's character fair enough, but his step sister. Not necessary. She creeps me out the most.
I think they're actually married, BTW
Now I'm kind of trying to think of how I even knew that
(See what I did there? - ha!)
@Emma What!? She's my favorite character!
That's creepier to me
http://www.eonline.com/uberblog/watch_with_kristin/b78384_michael_c_hall_jennifer_carpenter_are.html
@Emma We're waiting to see what people use it for :)  But I use it similar to a "Like."  I've noticed other people use it when they want to mark something for later.
@Emma: there's a topic in the Feedback group about the favoriting star
Just like Dexter has drifted away from following his "Code"
The wife and I just finished Season 4 on DVD. Have to admit -- I didn't see the end coming.
@Newkleer i loved the ending of season four(: If I wrote Dexter it would have happen in season 3
I am watching the first season. It is really cool.
@Newkleer - sadly news headlines contained spoilers that I read before I even started s4...
I loved S4, and really liked most parts of S5. But I was quite disappointed by the season ending, a little too easy. Not much to begin S6 with...

I started losing interest with season 3, and then really lost interest a few episodes into season 4. S1 and S2 were so fantastic, though. Should I give it another chance and were S3 and the first few eps of S4 just a series of misfires?
@KuraFire Yes, you really should. The way season 4 ends is absolutely amazing, and very surprising, also very sad.

@kurafire it gets a little dramatic and silly, which made me start losing interest too.  However, the season with Julia Stiles is pretty good.  She does a really good job even though I kept yelling at the tv "don't do that!"
I completely lost interest after the first few episodes of S3 really annoyed me. But seems like I have to watch it again to get to S4. The first two seasons were great, though.

@karenism JULIA STILES. That’s all you had to say, because, honestly, I love her work regardless of what it is she does, even though I’m not really attracted to her. Her presence in something will sometimes be enough for me to watch it.

Mrtazz - trust me, you DON'T need to watch season 3 in order to go on to season 4 (WHICH IS AMAZING).  There are only a few key things that are relevant to the plot that you need to know, and you can just look that up on an overview of the season online somewhere.  I say this from experience.  I skipped it too.  I watched the first 3 episodes, realized it was god awful, got further confirmation from others that it was awful, and just skipped it.
@JENocide thanks for the tip. I might start watching again where I left off and if I still don't like it, I'll skip it with good conscience. :)
